messages.message: Bazel in Crafting sandbox has been pretty slow for me lately. My sandbox almost always shows 100% CPU uptime and 80% memory usage. Code intellisense for golang has been way too slow to be able to use it.
do you use the terminal or webIDE?
I ssh into the terminal and via VSCode

for me, going via the terminal is way faster.
There seemed to be some issue with vscode and running `lsof`
Dunno if @sean.donohoe was able to find some root cause
I have not been able to identify a root cause, this doesn't seem to happen in many sandboxes and, for those where it does happen, doesn't seem to get triggered consistently :confused:
Best guess thus far is something being off with the user's vscode configs, but I can't say what exactly
Hmm. I'll try removing all go related vscode settings then
It seems faster now! I'll comment again if it gets slower afterward. Thank you, Sean!
great to hear!! sorry this keeps coming up as a pain point, definitely tag me if it seems like this is happening again in the future and I'll do what I can to help unblock :pray:
No worries! It has been going well in the last hour :blob-bear-dance:
